name: Equipped Summons
description: The minions gain the affixes of your $equipSlot.

name: Shredding Summons
description: When the minions hit with melee atks, their target's phys res is slightly reduced until the end of the minion's next turn.

name: Berserking Summons
target: Powers that summon minions that can take phys dmg
description: The minions deal substantially more damage, but have slightly less HP and barely reduced phys res.

name: Exsanguinating Summons
description: When the minions hit with melee atks dealing $physType dmg, their target is inflicted with a DoT dealing slight {physType} dmg, stacking until CON save (minion's DC).

name: Phlebotomising Summons
description: The minions deal more $physType damage over time.

name: Sapping Summons
description: When the minions are hit, the offender is slowed until CON save (minion's DC).

name: Charging Summons
description: As an action, the minions can move up to their speed. During this movement, they can move through hostile creatures' spaces. For each creature they move through, they may attack them, dealing half dmg as $physType on a hit and pushing them 5' in a direction of their choice.

name: Rugged Summons
description: The minions gain +1 to saves vs debuffs

name: Taunting Summons
description: At the end of the minions' turns, all adj creatures of their choice are taunted by the minion until the end of the minion's next turn.

name: Whirling Summons
description: 1/combat, as an action, the minions can move up to half their speed. During this movement, they can move through hostile creatures' spaces. For each creature they either move through or through an adj space of, they may make a melee wep atk against them, dealing slightly less dmg as $physType on a hit.

name: Empowered Summons
description: The minions add $nonPhysType dmg to their hits.

name: Decaying Summons
description: When the minions hit with melee atks, their target is inflicted with a DoT dealing slight $nonPhysType dmg, stacking until DEX save (minion's DC).

name: Dracotouched Summons
description: 1/combat, as a bonus action, the minions breathe a cone of magical energy in a 15' cone, making a spell atk against all foes inside, dealing less dmg as $nonPhysType on a hit.

name: Destructive Summons
description: The limited features of the minions deal slightly more dmg and have slightly larger AoE sizes.

name: Overcharged Summons
description: The limited features of the minions have their cooldowns increased by 1 step, but inflict a DoT dealing $nonPhysType dmg, stacking until DEX save (minion's DC), on hit

name: Reflective Summons
description: The minions gain substantial dmg thorns.

name: Regenerating Summons
description: The minions gain barely any passive regen.

name: Bulky Summons
description: The minions gain more maximum hit points.

name: Reparable Summons
description: The minions gain a slight amount of incoming healing.

name: Solid Summons
description: The minions gain slightly more dmg for each phys dmg type they are either resistant or immune to.

name: Efficiency
target: Powers that can deal dmg and have a non-cooldown resource cost
description: The power's cost is 1 step lower, but it deals less dmg.

name: Massive Power
description: The power's largest area deals substantially more dmg.

name: Assassination
description: The power deals substantially more dmg against bosses.

name: Focused Power
description: The power's smallest area deals substantially more dmg.

name: Spread Power
description: The power deals more AoE dmg.

name: Focused Area
description: The power's areas all conform to the same shape and area as one of the original areas of your choice, but it no longer deals any extra crit dmg.

name: Keen Shielding
description: Whenever the power crits, you gain a substantial amount of temp HP.

name: Dull Criticals
description: The power has +3 crit range, but no longer deals any extra crit dmg.

name: Keen Recovery
target: Powers that have a non-cooldown resource cost
description: Whenever the power crits, its resource cost is refunded.

name: Murderous Recovery
target: Powers that have a non-cooldown resource cost
description: Whenever the power scores a killing blow, its resource cost is refunded.

name: Dull Infliction
target: Powers that can deal dmg and can apply debuffs
description: The power deals less dmg, but any debuffs it can apply have +2 to their DCs.

name: Sapping
description: Whenever the power hits, the target becomes sluggish until the end of your next turn.

name: Focused Sapping
target: Powers that have multiple areas that can hit
description: Whenever the power's smallest area hits, the target becomes sluggish until the end of your next turn.

name: Cruelty
target: Powers that can deal dmg and can apply debuffs
description: Any debuffs the power can apply have +1 to their DCs, and the power deals slightly more dmg to debuffed targets.

name: Massive Infliction
target: Powers that have multiple areas that can hit
description: Whenever the power's largest area hits, it deals more dmg and the target becomes sluggish until the end of your next turn.

name: Spread Infliction
target: Powers that have multiple areas that can hit
description: Whenever the power hits, it deals slightly more dmg and the target become sluggish until the end of your next turn.

name: Whirling Energy
target: Powers that have a non-persistent area
description: After the area resolves, it leaves a vortex of energy, a pers area that lasts until the end of your next turn, making spell atks that deal slight $nonPhysType dmg.

name: Lingering Infliction
description: If you have used the power since the start of your last turn, your DoTs deal barely more dmg and your debuff DCs have a +1 bonus.

name: Focused Whirling
target: Powers that have multiple non-persistent areas
description: Whenever the power's smallest area resolves it leaves a vortex of energy, a pers area that lasts until the end of your next turn, making spell atks that deal $nonPhysType dmg.

name: Persistent Power
target: Any power with a persistent area
description: The power's persistent areas have slightly more dmg and slightly more area.

name: Massive Energy
target: Powers that have multiple non-persistent areas
description: Whenever the power's largest area resolves it leaves a vortex of energy, a pers area that lasts until the end of your next turn, making spell atks that deal slight $nonPhysType dmg. Additionally, any buffs triggered from the power have slightly more effectiveness.

name: Spread Energy
target: Powers that have multiple non-persistent areas
description: Whenever the power's areas resolve, they leave vortices of energy, pers areas that last until the end of your next turn, making spell atks that deal barely any $nonPhysType dmg. Additionally, any buffs triggered from the power have barely more duration.

name: Focused Efficiency
target: Powers that have multiple areas and a non-cooldown resource cost
description: The power's cost is 1 step lower, but its largest area deals substantially less dmg.

name: Major Spread
target: Powers that have multiple areas and a non-cooldown resource cost
description: The power's areas deal massively more dmg, but its cost is 1 step higher.

name: Keen Power
description: The power deals barely more dmg and has +1 crit range.

name: Slow Power
description: The power deals substantially more dmg, has +1 Accuracy, and has its usage time increased by 1 action step.

name: Fragmentation
description: Whenever the power's projs hit, they explode in a 15' cone originating from the opposite side of the target. The cone makes a spell atk against all foes, dealing slight $nonPhysType dmg on a hit.

name: Focused Energy
target: Powers with a cooldown and a non-instantaneous duration
description: The power deals more dmg and its cooldown is reduced by 1 step, but its duration is reduced by 1 step.

name: Slow Splitting
target: Powers with a non-cooldown resource cost that fire projectiles
description: The power fires 3 additional projs, each aiming 45 degrees in a different direction of your choice from the original projs, but its usage time is increased by 1 action step, its resoure cost is increased by 1 step, and it deals less dmg.

name: Spread
description: The power's cones are 5' wider at all distances.

name: Piercing
description: The power's projectiles are converted to line AoEs but it deals less dmg.

name: Decaying Penetration
description: Each creature hit by the power's lines gets a DoT dealing slight $nonPhysType dmg, stacking until CON save.

name: Endurance
target: Powers with non-instantaneous durations that can deal damage
description: The power's duration increases by 1 step, but it deals less dmg.

name: Clumsy Power
description: The power deals substantially more dmg but has -1 Accuracy.

name: Building Assassination
description: Whenever the power hits a boss, it gains dmg for the remainder of its duration.

name: Building Power
description: Each turn of the power's duration, it gains slightly more dmg.

name: Unstable Speed
target: Powers that do not require concentration and can deal damage
description: The power's usage time is reduced by 2 action steps, but it now requires concentration and deals less dmg.

name: Swift Channelling
target: Powers that require reactivation each round and can deal damage
description: The power's reactivation time is reduced by 1 action step, but it now deals less dmg.

name: Shielding
description: Whenever the power hits, you gain temp HP.

name: Tiring Exertion
target: Powers with non-instantaneous durations that can deal damage
description: For the power's duration, you project a 5' aura that inflicts sluggish on foes until the end of their turn, but the power deals less damage.

name: Intensity
description: The power deals massively more damage, but its duration is reduced by 1 step.

name: Focused Channelling
target: Powers with non-instantaneous durations that require reactivation each round
description: The power's reactivation time is reduced by 1 action step, but you are slowed for its duration.

name: Charged Shielding
target: Powers with cooldowns that can have targeted directions
description: If the power is directed at a non-self target, it projects a 10'-wide magical barrier for the combat that completely blocks projs, in the space in front of you in the targeted direction. The power's cooldown also increases by 1 step.

name: Charged Obstacles
target: Powers that form objs or structs and can deal dmg
description: Any objs or structs formed by the power have their durations extended by 2 steps, but the power's cooldown is increased by 1 step and it deals less damage.

name: Empowering Obstacles
target: Powers that form objs or structs
description: While an obj or struct formed by the power is active, you deal slightly more $nonPhysType dmg and have slightly more {nonPhysType} res.

name: Volatile Obstacles
target: Powers that form objs or structs and can deal dmg
description: When an obj or struct formed by the power expires, it erupts in a staggering explosion. All foes adj to the entity are staggered until the end of your next turn. The power deals massively less damage.

name: Building Ailments
target: Powers with non-instantaneous durations that deal damage
description: For each turn of the power's duration, any debuffs it can apply have +1 to their related DCs. The power deals less damage.

name: Explosive Power
description: Whenever the power hits, a nova erupts from the target, attacking all foes within 5' of the target (including them), dealing 1d4 $nonPhysType spell dmg on a hit. The power deals substantially less dmg.

name: Ailments
description: Any debuffs the power can apply have +1 to their related DCs.

name: Empowering Ailments
description: Whenever the power inflicts a debuff, you deal more spell dmg until the end of your next turn.

name: Sudden Eruption
target: Powers that require reactivation each round and do not have a cone AoE
description: The power's duration is now instantaneous and only activates on casting, but now affects a cone area with length equal to the original range or area length. It also deals substantially more dmg.

name: Inflicting Eruption
description: Any debuffs the power can apply have +1 to their related DCs, and the power deals barely more dmg.

name: Cruel Power
description: The power deals more dmg to debuffed targets.

name: Keen Cruelty
description: The power has +1 crit range against debuffed targets.

name: Speed
description: The power's usage time is reduced by 1 step, but it deals less dmg.

name: Focused Speed
target: Powers that have multiple individual targets
description: The power's usage time is reduced by 1 step and it deals slightly more dmg for each additional individual target it has above 1, but it now only has 1 individual target.

name: Channeling
target: Powers with an instantaneous duration and a non-self/melee range
description: The power's duration becomes 'Concentration, up to 1 minute', and you can reactivate its effect as its usage time throughout the duration. Its range is also halved.

name: Overcharged Penetration
target: Powers with a non-cooldown resource cost that require concentration and fire projectiles
description: The power's projectiles are converted to 5'-wide line AoEs and deal more dmg, but its cost is increased by 1 step.

name: Efficient Channeling
target: Powers with a non-cooldown resource cost that require concentration and deal dmg
description: The power's cost is 1 step lower, but it deals less dmg.

name: Protective Channeling
description: While concentrating on the power, you have barely more phys res and slightly more $nonPhysType res.

name: Distance
description: The power's range is doubled.

name: Efficient Power
target: Powers with a non-cooldown resource cost
description: The power's cost is 1 step lower and it deals barely more dmg.

name: Shredding
description: Whenever the power hits, the target's $nonPhysType res is reduced.

name: Unstable Focus
target: Powers that have multiple individual targets
description: If all of the power's individual targets are the same, a burst of energy erupts around the target, making a spell atk against all foes within 5' of the target (including them), dealing slight $nonPhysType dmg.

name: Reliable Explosions
target: Powers with sphere areas that trigger from hits
description: The power's sphere areas still trigger even if the required effects do not hit.

name: Telekinesis
description: The power's projectiles have +1 Accuracy.

name: Decay
description: Whenever the power hits, the target is inflicted with a DoT dealing slight $nonPhysType dmg, stacking until DEX save.

name: Spreading Decay
description: Whenever the power hits, the target is inflicted with a DoT dealing barely any $nonPhysType dmg, stacking until DEX save. Whenever this DoT ticks, it spreads to all creatures of your choice adj to the afflicted creature.

name: Powerful Decay
description: The power's DoTs deal more dmg.

name: Penetration
description: The power ignores dmg res.

name: Precision
description: The power has +1 crit range.

name: Volatile Destruction
description: Whenever the power hits, it deals slight additional $nonPhysType dmg. Additionally, its crits deal more dmg.

name: Distant Power
description: The power's range is doubled and it deals barely more dmg.

name: Overcharged Eruption
target: Powers with a non-cooldown resource cost that fire a single projectile
description: The power's proj is converted into a cone with a length equal to the proj's range and deals more dmg, but its cost is increased by 1 step.

name: Keen Lag
description: The power has +3 crit range, but its usage time is increased by 1 step.

name: Dull Debilitation
description: The power can no longer crit, but whenever it usually would, it debilitates the target until CON save.

name: Stacked Focus
description: The power's cone areas are now lines of the same length that activate twice over the same area, but its usage time is increased by 1 step.

name: Blunt Power
description: The power deals massively more dmg, but its line areas are converted to non-piercing projs with range equal to the line's length.

name: Leeching Empowerment
description: Whenever you deal $physType dmg having used the power since the start of your last turn, heal a slight amount of HP.

name: Blunt Eruption
target: Powers with line areas that have a non-cooldown resource cost
description: The power's line areas are converted to non-piercing projs with range equal to the line's length and deal less dmg, and its cost is increased by 1 step. Additionally, whenever these projs hit, they splinter into a 15' cone AoE from the other side of the target, a spell atk dealing massive phys dmg.

name: Erupting Power
description: The power's cone areas deal more dmg.

name: Massive Blasting
description: The power's cone areas are longer.

name: Erupting Exsanguination
description: Whenever the power's cone areas hit, the target is inflicted with a DoT dealing slight $physType dmg, stacking until CON save.

name: Erupting Cruelty
description: The power's cone areas deal more dmg against debuffed targets.

name: Keen Eruption
target: Powers with cone areas that make atk rolls
description: The power's cone areas have +1 crit range.

name: Destructive Eruption
description: The power's cone areas deal more crit dmg.

name: Overcharged Splintering
target: Powers with line areas and a non-cooldown resource cost
description: Whenever the power's line areas end, they release a 15' long cone from that point in the same direction as the line, a spell atk against foes dealing substantial $physType dmg. The power's line areas have their lengths halved and its cost is increased by 1 step.

name: Targeted Conclusion
target: Powers with line areas and a non-cooldown resource cost
description: The power's line areas are always of a length of your choice, up to their original length, and deal substantially more dmg. The power's cost is increased by 1 step.

name: Close Power
description: The power deals substantially more dmg but its range is halved.

name: Keen Destruction
description: The power has +1 crit range and deals barely more crit dmg.

name: Destruction
description: The power deals more crit dmg.

name: Sacrificial Destruction
description: The power deals substantially more crit dmg, but whenever it crits you lose a slight amount of HP.

name: Keen Support
description: If you have an active minion when you use the power, you gain +1 crit range until the end of your next turn. This does not stack.

name: Overcharged Exsanguination
target: Powers with a non-cooldown resource cost that can deal damage
description: Whenever the power hits, the target is inflicted with a DoT that deals substantial $physType dmg, stacking until CON save. The power's cost is increased by 1 step and it deals less dmg.

name: Delayed Leeching
description: Whenever the power hits, you heal HP at the start of your next turn.

name: Healing
description: The power heals more HP.

name: Efficient Healing
target: Powers with a non-cooldown resource cost that heal
description: The power's cost is reduced by 1 step, but it heals less HP.

name: Sacrificial Power
description: If you have an active minion when you use the power, the power deals massively more dmg but kills all of your minions.

name: Duplication
description: Whenever you use the power, it is used again at no additional cost, but its dmg is substantially reduced.

name: Reckless Power
description: The power deals substantially more dmg to foes, but massively more dmg to allies.

name: Feasting
description: Whenever you reduce an ally to 0 HP with the power, you heal HP.

name: Bloodthirsty Empowerment
description: Whenever you deal $physType dmg have delivered a KB with the power since the start of your last turn, heal a slight amount of HP.

name: Keen Empowerment
description: If you have delivered a KB with the power since the start of your last turn, you have +1 crit range.

name: Armour Shredding [marrow shards done]
description: Whenever the power hits, the target gets slightly reduced phys res until the end of your next turn.
